meanings.definition: A person or entity that holds an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: The policyholders must pay their premiums on time to keep their insurance active.
meanings.sent2: The policyholders were relieved to know that their property was protected.
meanings.sent3: The policyholders joked about starting an insurance club for extra protection.
meanings.sent4: The policyholders were the guardians of their own financial security.
meanings.sent5: The policyholders felt secure knowing they were covered in case of emergencies.

meanings.definition: Those who are covered by an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: All policyholders are entitled to certain benefits outlined in their insurance plan.
meanings.sent2: The insurance company reassured the policyholders that their claims would be processed quickly.
meanings.sent3: The policyholders celebrated when they realized they were fully covered for the damages.
meanings.sent4: The policyholders were like a shield against unexpected financial burdens.
meanings.sent5: The policyholders felt a sense of relief knowing they were protected by their insurance policy.
